=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Multifunctional Wig Stand Holder 1Pcs Portable Folding Stable Durable Wig Stand Wig Hanger for Multiple Wigs and Hats Vertical Wig Stand Hanging Wig Hangers Wall-mounted Display Styling Wig Dryer Tool
Review Date: 2021/02/09
Store: CLIONE
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Material': 'Pvc', 'Brand': 'CLIONE', 'Base Type': 'Pedestal', 'Package Dimensions': '11.77 x 8.35 x 0.94 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '779303827378'}
Review Text: Easy to put together.  I mostly utilize the hanger for additional space where I keep my wigs.  I was hoping to use the stand for styling purposes, but it is a bit flimsy and doesn't really help much. It is also a bit too short for my longer wigs.  All in all, it does help me save space so it was worth obtaining.
Review Title: Worth obtaining
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
UV LED Nail Lamp 120W High Power Nail Dryer for Gel Nail Polish with 4 Timer Setting 42 gel Light,Professional Auto Sensor Nail Light for Fingernail,Toenail,Home,Salon
LWQIONG
{'Brand': 'LWQIONG', 'Special Feature': 'Motion Sensor', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Plastic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene', 'Room Type': 'Office'}
I used this to put on my first set of polygel nails.  It was super easy to use and did the job as I expected it would.  The auto function was extremely handy, as was the ability to time it if I wanted.
Did the job as expected
Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
AIFAIFA
{'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit. I already had a UV lamp, but I like this one better.  It is more compact and seems to work a little better. I love the polish, and all of the nail art. It is so much easier than normal polish.  I am by no means an expert, but the poly gel is the only thing that did not work for me.  I could not get it to cure.  Even after the full polish it still felt like it could crumble off at any moment.  I only did by thumbs, pinkies, and ring fingers, and the gel was broken on all of them in a couple of days.  It seemed to last a little longer on the nails I did polish as well (my thumbs).  For one day they might be okay.  But the rest of the kit makes it worth it.
I like that this unit is a fully functional nail kit
3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE
PURELEOR
{'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'}
I have just started to delve into the world of false lashes.  I am by no means an expert, and still am not sure which look I prefer.  This brand, with the eyeliner, is one that I find among the easier to apply.  I think I may have to trim them, and I sometimes have issues on the outside corner with keeping it in place, but they flatter my eyes well.
Eyelash beginner

I use these to keep my polygel nails on the help cure them.  I have a terrible habit of knocking them out of place.  These tip clips work perfectly for that, although they could be used as a soak-off as well.
Work exactly as needed

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference**: The user has expanded their beauty interests to include false lashes, innovative tools for nail applications, and foot care products, showcasing a holistic approach to beauty treatments and self-care. They are now incorporating wig-related products into their beauty routine, reflecting an interest in hair care and styling.

- **Ease of Use**: Convenience remains a priority for the user. They seek user-friendly products that simplify their beauty routine, mirroring their previous interest in items like foot masks. The user values tools that can be integrated effortlessly into their regimen without causing mess or hassle.

- **Quality and Performance**: The user maintains a positive outlook on product performance and shows flexibility across beauty categories. They prioritize enjoyable experiences, accepting minor inconveniences if products deliver overall satisfaction. Their latest review reflects a practical evaluation focusing on space-saving and utility, despite some limitations regarding structure and height.

- **Flexibility in Use**: Versatile products suited for both personal and professional use continue to be essential for the user. They emphasize tools that enhance their beauty routine while also offering utility for clients or others.

- **Material Awareness**: With a commitment to material quality, the user values durability and functionality, aiming for aesthetically appealing products that do not compromise on performance.

Overall, the user is on a diverse beauty journey, seeking effective, convenient solutions that align with their evolving interests in personal enjoyment and professional applications, while remaining open to experimentation across various beauty techniques.
